AIR.DESCRIPTION: This card can only be played if you have Flight.

BREW.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a potion after a specific amount of turns.

BREWING.DESCRIPTION: You need less turns to brew potions.

DISORIENTED.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack of this Enemy has no effect.

FLIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Reduce attack damage taken by 50%. Reduced by one if you take attack damage.

THIRSTY.DESCRIPTION: The enemy takes 50% more damage from potions.
